Akwai (name changed from TwoWks in early 2016) is a mobile app that allows students to track the steps they are taking toward a goal. The app then pairs them with accountability partners for routine check-ins. Over the last five years we have incorporated over 500 individual pieces of research into our proprietary algorithm that takes the users minimal inputs and converts them into over 1,500 data points. We have built an adaptive learning AI that gives personalized recommendations based on the student’s history so that each student receives a custom plan based on their unique characteristics.

TwoWks is a software company that helps people track their steps toward a goal and establishes a periodic check-in system with accountability partners. Students will use TwoWks’s mobile app (or website) once a week to track the progress toward specific goals (e.g. improve overall grades, get financial aid for college, increase personal happiness, etc.). Each time the students use the app to update their progress, they will also view a classmate’s progress and leave a positive comment – this ensures each student has consistent accountability. This whole process will only take 5 – 10 minutes per week. Throughout the school year the mobile app will take students through an interactive lesson plan that will increase parental involvement, instill solid habits, boost their motivation and transition them into post-secondary education. We incentivize students to get their parents, relatives and adult family friends to download TwoWks’s mobile app. This will allow supporting adults to receive detailed progress updates and participate in collaborative activities. A student with an engaged support system will benefit from the experience and knowledge of the group. “It takes a village to raise a child.”
How It Works - TwoWks Demo (14 minutes)
How It Works - TwoWks Demo (14 minutes)

TwoWks has partnered with some of the top real estate professionals in the nation to create RealtorBootCamp.com, which is a 30 day business accelerator for relators. Everything happens online so they don't need to travel. During this month-long program, participants will collaborate with other realtors in their area, learn innovative techniques, automate their marketing and take actionable steps toward their desired lifestyle.

RosterRecharge is a sports software platform that helps teams be more productive, motivated and accountable. The website has 21 tools that help coaches, athletes and parents in a variety of ways. One of our biggest values is our H20S Program which helps high school’ers build a support system around their specific goals. The program has athletes fill out detailed weekly reports that break down the specific steps they took to reach their goals. Coaches, Teammates, Parents, Friends and other supporters will have access to these reports. They will be able to see if the report was submitted on time, late, or not at all – as well as if the athlete reached their weekly milestones. Athletes will gain points for submitting their reports on time, collaborating with Accountability Partners, completing H20S assignments and other productive tasks. When they earn enough points, they will be able to receive: [a] personalized video messages from athletes in the NFL, MLB, NBA, MLS, NHL, WNBA and other professional leagues, [b] tickets to professional sports events/games and [c] gear from brands like Nike, Under Armour, Reebok and Adidas.

Dasash is an innovative marketing agency that offers many different web-based services. Our flagship product is our SC Pages (explained on the website). For your convenience, our website is laid out like an online store. Here is how it works: First we help your company come up with a 5 – 15 question survey. We specialize in surveys that deal with Customer Satisfaction, Customer Loyalty, Product Feedback, Market Research and Marketing Effectiveness. Once the questions are finalized, we create an SC-Page to house your survey. This is a diagram of an SC Page. SC is short for “Survey Collaboration” and an SC-Page is a collaborative marketing solution that allows a business to refer their past customers to other companies. The SC-Page can look like the other pages on your current website, or you can choose from one of our ready-made themes. After you do business with one of your customers, you can give them a flyer with a link (or QR Code) to your survey. Using surveys to engage your customers and stockpile feedback is invaluable. Although, the primary purpose of creating an SC-Page is the opportunity it gives you have customers referred to your business from other companies. The three advertisings slots on your SC-Page can be bartered with other companies who also have SC-Pages. The advertising slot sizes are; [a.] large, [b.] medium and [c.] small.
